summary: This is a US Marshals Service/JPATS transfer receipt documenting the movement of two inmates from the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (NYM) to the Brooklyn Metropolitan Detention Center (BUSB) on July 24, 2019. The document is part of the Epstein case data set, indicating it relates to the custody or transfer of individuals connected to the investigation.

persons.context: Listed as an inmate being transferred from the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (NYM) to the Brooklyn Metropolitan Detention Center (BUSB) on July 24, 2019, under registration number 86268054.

connections.description: Both individuals were transferred together on the same JPATS/USMS flight (PTN01840-19) from NYM to BUSB on July 24, 2019.

events.title: Inmate Transfer from NYM to BUSB
events.description: Two inmates, Howard Ayllon and Demitri Reese, were transferred via JPATS/USMS from the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (NYM) to the Brooklyn Metropolitan Detention Center (BUSB) under trip number PTN01840-19.

keyFacts: The document is a US Marshals Service (USMS) and Justice Prisoner and Alien Transportation System (JPATS) transfer receipt dated July 24, 2019.
It records the transfer of two inmates, Howard Ayllon and Demitri Reese, from a federal facility in New York (NYM) to a federal facility in Brooklyn (BUSB).

The document is part of the Epstein case data set (EFTA00120449/EFTA00120450), suggesting the transferred individuals may have some connection to the broader Jeffrey Epstein investigation or related proceedings.
The transfer was conducted under a specific trip number: PTN01840-19.
